name: crdt-protocols
description: Protocols for encoding and decoding CRDT data.

scripts.build: protons protobufs/*.proto && mkdir -p dist build-ts && touch dist/cleanup build-ts/cleanup && rm -R dist/* build-ts/* && ./move-protos.sh && tsc -b && rm -R build-ts/* && cp src/* build-ts/ && tsc -b && rm -R build-ts

author: Saul Boyd
